Set a callback function for a menuitem.

parameterdescription.para: Data to send to the callback function.

detaileddescription.para: Set a submenu for a menuitem. A menuitem with a submenu cannot have a callback.
Get the submenu for a menuitem.
Set a trigger key for the item.

parameterdescription.para: The key that will trigger the item when the parent manu is visible

detaileddescription.para: Get the trigger key for a menuitem.

simplesect.para: The trigger key for the menuitem.

detaileddescription.para: Set an ID for the menuitem.
Get the ID of the menuitem.
Activate a menuitem. Activating the menuitem will first trigger the 'activate' signal for the menuitem. Then the callback for the menuitem is triggered, if there is one.

simplesect.para: Whether the callback for the menuitem was called.
